catalog.name: Existing Wind Plants
catalog.description: This collection includes information relating to the location and power class of wind turbines generators having power higher than 200 kW installed on the national territory.

members.name: Database of Wind Turbine Generators
members.description: Map of the wind turbine generators present on the national territory (reference year 2019), derived from an elaboration by Research on the Energy System - RSE S.p.A. starting from GSE data, The Wind Power and Sentinel-2 satellite images. A power class is associated with each wind turbine.
